General.Name: Chongqing Baiya Sanitary Products Co
General.Description: Chongqing Baiya Sanitary Products Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of disposable personal hygiene products in China. It also offers personal health care products, including sanitary napkins, baby diapers, and adult incontinence products under the Freedom, free point, good, denim, and Haozhi brand names. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Chongqing, China.
